package.name: Country Functions
package.author: Dan Hoover
package.description: A group of functions that allow you to deal with world wide country codes.

function.name: isValidCountry()
function.description: Returns true if a 2 or 3 digit country code is valid. Otherwise returns false.

function.name: countryFromCode($string)
function.description: Returns the name of a country from a 2 or 3 digit country code is valid. Returns false if invalid.

function.name: countryCodes2()
function.description: Returns an array of ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 2-digit country codes in ABC order. Great for generating forms.

function.name: countryCodes3()
function.description: Returns an array of ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 3-digit country codes in ABC order. Great for generating forms.
